name: Heistin' n' Hacking
description:
Heistin N Hackin is a game about Revenge. You are a simple man who has been scammed by a big insurance company. When your wife needed an expensive surgery without which she could not survive. The insurance company then didn't help. You filed a suite but none listened.

You then resort to robbery. The company has a jewel. It's their most prized possession. If you steal that, you can help your wife and bring down the insurance scam.
After some planning you realise that you cannot pull the heist alone. So you call your friend, a cool hacker to help you out.
Stronger Together, you both now have a heist to take on.

The game contains 3 levels and can be played by 1 player or 2 players on the same device.

This game was made by Kunal Kashyap, Sanat Mahajan and Dheer Rai for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1


- hacked font by David Libeau.
